properties.name: rbac.role.node.type
properties.description: Setting for rbac role tree node type 'role' icon css rendering.

properties.name: rbac.user.node.type
properties.description: Setting for rbac role tree node type 'user' icon css rendering.

properties.name: rbac.action.node.type
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission tree node type 'action' icon css rendering.

properties.name: rbac.field.node.type
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission tree node type 'field' icon css rendering.

properties.name: rbac.group.node.type
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission tree node type 'group' icon css rendering.

properties.name: rbac.entity.node.type
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission tree node type 'entity' icon css rendering.

properties.name: rbac.role.default
properties.description: Setting for rbac predefined default role group id, this role will be used for all new login user.

properties.name: rbac.role.sysadmin
properties.description: Setting for rbac predefined system admin role group id, this role include all allow permission for all entities' actions.'

properties.name: rbac.perm.status.default
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission status default type, usually use 'reject' permission status type.

properties.name: rbac.perm.status.allowed
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission status type to be treated as 'allow' permission.

properties.name: rbac.perm.status.expired
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission status type to be treated as 'expired' permission.

properties.name: rbac.perm.status.inactive
properties.description: Setting for rbac permission status type to be treated as 'inactive' permission.

properties.name: rbac.perm.status.rejected
properties.description: Setting for list of rbac permission status type to be treated as 'reject' permission, use '|' as delimiter.

properties.name: rbac.perm.fmt.str
properties.description: Setting for default permission string of rbac function

properties.name: rbac.perm.inherit.nocheck
properties.description: Render rbac inherited disabled permission as 'nocheck' style.

properties.name: smtp.login.required
properties.description: flag if require smtp login (y/n). for pre-dev(local): y; for d, t, u, p: n

properties.name: password.protector.file
properties.description: absolute location of password protector file
